publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-757.1 Alasdair Allan: Harris Tweed Hebridesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-757) in the name of Peter Peacock, insert at end "commends the weavers of Lewis and Harris for their ongoing determination to ensure a future for their industry, and looks forward to the renewed contribution that they will now be able to make to the island economy."

S3M-757.1 Harris Tweed Hebrides (lodged on 2 November 2007) Bob Doris*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bashir Ahmad*, Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Brian Adam*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-757.1 Harris Tweed Hebrides (lodged on 2 November 2007) Keith Brown*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-757.1 Harris Tweed Hebrides (lodged on 2 November 2007) Aileen Campbell*
S3M-757.1 Harris Tweed Hebrides (lodged on 2 November 2007) Michael Matheson*
